attributes.action: authorize the adoption of a flag for the county of Somerset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many counties have their own flag, which symbolizes those counties and the pride their people have in them. There should now be one for the whole of Somerset, which includes the administrative county of Somerset, Bath and North East Somerset and the outlying islands. One county, one flag!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " authorize the adoption of a flag for the county of Somerset."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17592


Prime Minister's Office
